skill_e.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward feared enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+1) magic damage over 2 seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes feared for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 second(s).

skill_i.tooltip:
Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.

skill_q.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals 65/110/155/200/245 (+0.75) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for 5 seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains 15/20/25/30/35% Movement Speed and 20/30/40/50/60 Attack Damage.

skill_r.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for ? seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing ? physical damage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains 30/35/40/45/50% Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

Shroud of Darkness will remain active during Paranoia's flight.
